findings.title: approve
findings.description: External approve function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Insecure Transfer Functions
findings.description: Multiple private transfer functions (_transferStandard, _transferToExcluded, _transferFromExcluded, _transferBothExcluded) are identified with potential security risks.

findings.title: _transferFromExcluded
findings.description: Private function _transferFromExcluded may have potential security risks.

findings.title: Mint Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The mint function has been marked as vulnerable.

findings.title: burn
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Functions
findings.description: Multiple swap functions are declared as external and do not have any access modifiers, making them vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The 'sync' function is not properly protected and can be called by anyone.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior or state changes.

findings.title: deliver
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability in deliver function

findings.title: marketingWalletChange
findings.description: The marketingWalletChange function has onlyOwner access modifier which can lead to centralization of control.

findings.title: changeTradingRouter
findings.description: The changeTradingRouter function has onlyOwner access modifier which may lead to unauthorized changes to the trading router.

findings.title: transferToDistribute
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: excludeFromReward
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function has a vulnerability that allows only the owner to call it.

findings.title: Unprotected Function 'includeInReward'
findings.description: The 'includeInReward' function has been declared as external and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing unauthorized access to modify reward settings.

findings.title: _approve
findings.description: Private function _approve has a vulnerability.

findings.title: _transfer Function Issues
findings.description: Multiple _transfer functions (_transferStandard, _transferToExcluded, _transferFromExcluded, _transferBothExcluded) have been identified with potential security risks.
